post:
Hi guys,

We have launched nice Byteshack special in Dallas. Also just to remind you, there are some new 8bit audio on http://byteshack.net for the fans :) 
Provision is not instant so you will wait for your server a little bit.

**Byteshack Super Special**

    XEN PV
    Dallas Location
    2 shared CPU cores
    384 MB RAM
    7 GB HW raid 10 SSD (6 drives array)
    500 GB BW
    1Gbps shared port
    2 IPv4
    10 IPv6
    Sale price $3.7 USD P/M or $32 USD P/Y

**[Order Link](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=133)**

For datacenter location, test IPs and other infos check dedicated minisite: http://byteshack.net

---------------------------------

We have prepared nice XEN 100GB storage VPS for you on our XENstorage platform. So there is no excuses for not making backups any more. Provision is not instant so you will wait for your server a little bit.

**XENStorage Super Special**

    XEN PV
    Chicago Location
    1 CPU Core
    256 MB RAM
    1 GBPS Uplink
    1x IPv4 and 1x IPv6
    512 GB Transfer
    100 GB RAID6 Storage
    Sale price $3.00 P/M or $30 P/Y

**[Order Link](https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=134)**

For datacenter location, test IPs and other infos check dedicated minisite: http://xenstorage.com

---------------------------------

If you need something custom, feel free to contact us.
